name: Spooky Soccer (NES)
description:
Spooky Soccer is a 1-4 player sports simulation NES game. You play as a friendly ghost helping your team win. As a ghost you have 4 special abilities you can perform all of which have a cooldown upon being used:

  • Musicbox - Puts nearby players to sleep.
  • Scare - Scares the ball handler (if nearby) causing them to shoot.
  • Promote - Increases the natural abilities of a player on the field.
  • TNT - Causes an explosion on the field hurling nearby players to the ground.

Controls

  • A - Manifest causing the ball if nearby to move towards your position.
  • B - Perform a special ability.
  • SELECT - Changes the selected special ability
  • UP|DOWN|LEFT|RIGHT - Moves your ghost cursor around the field.

Made by @cacciatc with music and SFX by @kulor for the NESDEV22 compo.
